name: Polaris
description: Polaris is a casual game, where you tasked to overcome the level, using 2 synchronously moving circles and sent to the next level!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 6100 Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 210 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel Core i7 7700 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT710 Storage: 100 MB available space
